programme.title: The first Mexican Olympic figure skater in 30 years | Winter Tracks
programme.desc: When he competes in next Olympic Winter Games, Donovan Carrillo will be the first figure skater from Mexico to do so in 30 years. In a country with barely any Olympic size rinks, he is an artist who believes figure skating has given him the perfect platform to express himself. He moved away from his hometown and family when he was 13. Living with his coach, Gregorio Núñez, a father-like figure, to further his training. Together, they have overcome huge obstacles including lack of resources, funding and recent COVID restrictions to finally qualify for the Games.

programme.title: Women's Short Program - Figure Skating | PyeongChang 2018 Replays
programme.desc: The women's short program was held at the Gangneung Ice Arena on 21 February 2018.

programme.title: Coming of age: China after Beijing 2008 | Episode 4
programme.desc: Following 2008, participation in sports – both summer and winter – has been booming in China. See how a winter sports frenzy has primed China for the 2022 Winter Olympics.

programme.title: You & Kierkegaard focused on living their Olympic dream
programme.desc: South Korean figure skater You Young, 11, and teenage Argentine equestrian rider Ricardo Kierkegaard have their sights set on the Olympics.

programme.title: Vancouver 2010 Historical Flashback: Speed Skating Men's Team Pursuit
programme.desc: Enjoy the action of Men’s Speed Skating Team Pursuit from Vancouver 2010

programme.title: Salt Lake 2002 - Closing Ceremony
programme.desc: The ceremony took place on February 24th and was designed by Seven Nielsen with music directed by Mark Watters.

programme.title: Sydney 2000 - Opening Ceremony
programme.desc: The ceremony took place on 15 September in Stadium Australia. Cathy Freeman ignited the Olympic flame.

programme.title: Sydney 2000 - Closing Ceremony
programme.desc: The ceremony took place on 1 October in Stadium Australia. It attracted a record attendance of 114,714 people.

programme.title: Nagano 1998 - Opening Ceremony
programme.desc: The opening ceremony of the XVIII Olympic Winter Games.

programme.title: Nagano 1998 - Closing Ceremony
programme.desc: The closing ceremony of the XVIII Olympic Winter Games.

programme.title: Atlanta 1996 - Opening Ceremony
programme.desc: The ceremony took place on 19 July in the Centennial Olympic Stadium. The ceremony featured John Williams, Celine Dion and Gladys Knight.

programme.title: Atlanta 1996 - Closing Ceremony
programme.desc: The ceremony took place on August 4 at the Centennial Olympic Stadium. Among the performers were Little Richard and Stevie Wonder.

programme.title: Lillehammer 1994 - Opening Ceremony
programme.desc: The ceremony took place on 12 February. The Games were declared open by King Harald V.

programme.title: VIVA - The Opening Ceremony Documentary of Rio 2016
programme.desc: For the first time ever, experience the work of a nation as it hosts the world and puts on a show like never before.

programme.title: The Top Teams Face Off in Torino | On Edge
programme.desc:
Coach Marie-France Dubreuil’s two top teams arrive in Torino for the Italian Grand Prix 2021: Madison and Zach, and Grabriella and Guillaume. Both coming from fresh wins at Skate America and Finlandia Trophy, this is the first time they compete against each other in this season 2021-2022 season.
Filmed in the last six months leading up to Beijing 2022, On Edge is the Olympic Channel’s first weekly figure skating reality docuseries featuring athletes Madison Chock and Evan Bates (USA), Gabriella Papadakis and Guillaume Cizeron (FRA), Madison Hubbell and Zach Donohue (USA), Olivia Smart and Adrian Diaz (ESP), Laurence Fournier-Beaudry and Nikolaj Sorensen (CAN), Lilah Fear and Lewis Gibson (GBR), and coaches Marie-France Dubreuil and Patrice Lauzon, Romain Haguenauer and three time Olympic Gold medallist Scott Moir.

programme.title: Competition Season Officially Begins | On Edge
programme.desc: It’s 4 months until Beijing 2022. Four of the teams arrive to Helsinki, Finland, for their first big competition of the season. Olivia and Adrian come face to face with the other Spanish team fighting for the same Olympic spot. Guillaume talks about his coming out story. Madison and Evan are eager to try their brand-new program. Filmed in the last six months leading up to Beijing 2022, On Edge is the Olympic Channel’s first weekly figure skating reality docuseries featuring athletes Madison Chock and Evan Bates (USA), Gabriella Papadakis and Guillaume Cizeron (FRA), Madison Hubbell and Zach Donohue (USA), Olivia Smart and Adrian Diaz (ESP), Laurence Fournier-Beaudry and Nikolaj Sorensen (CAN), Lilah Fear and Lewis Gibson (GBR), and coaches Marie-France Dubreuil and Patrice Lauzon, Romain Haguenauer and three time Olympic Gold medallist Scott Moir.

programme.title: Lillehammer 1994 - Closing Ceremony
programme.desc: Of the 2,200 people performing in the opening and closing ceremonies, only 50 were professionals.

programme.title: Barcelona 1992 - Opening Ceremony
programme.desc: The ceremony took place on 25 July in the Estadi Olímpic Lluís Companys. The Olympic flame cauldron was lit by a flaming arrow.

programme.title: Barcelona 1992 - Closing Ceremony
programme.desc: A spectacular ceremony with a majestic concert and pyrotechnics show closed an unforgettable edition of the Games.

programme.title: Albertville 1992 - Opening Ceremony
programme.desc: The Olympic cauldron was lit by a 9-year-old boy that jogged to the top of the stadium steps with France football legend Michel Platini.

programme.title: Albertville 1992 - Closing Ceremony
programme.desc: The ceremony was held at the Théâtre des Cérémonies, a temporary stadium disassembled following the Games.

programme.title: Opening Ceremony | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: Re-experience an Opening Ceremony for the ages, walking you through the history of the Host nation while celebrating Olympic Values in spectatcular fashion.

programme.title: Closing Ceremony | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: Experience the grandeur of the Paris 2024 Olympic Games closing ceremony. Relive the unforgettable moments that marked the end of a historic event in the City of Light.

programme.title: Opening Ceremony | Beijing 2022 Replays
programme.desc: This event took place on 04/02/2022 at the National Stadium
